favourite.article: 超讚ㄉ，感謝主
Oh Lord, We are follower of You.
Amen.

I was in my hostel on campus and so cold the by the Lord's arrangement two brothers visited me and we learnt this song. I really enjoyed the song and my spirit was revived. I ALWAYS WANT TO FOLLOW THE LAMB thus by walking according to my mingled spirit LORD I LOVE YOU!!
We follow the Lamb and are led by the mingled spirit!
My brother and I are touched. Thank God!
I have my Father's name written on my forehead.
Lord Jesus...I love You with my entire being. I so desire to remain in You and You in me. May I surrender my all to Follow You...The Lamb of God! I love You.
I thank the The Lord for our mouths so much because we are now able to Taste and See that our Lord is Good. Amen! Let's Keep Eating Saints.
Oh Lord, Amen. I want You Lord. I want to be one of one hundred and forty-four thousand people standing on Mount Zion. I want to be an overcomer like Daniel. Hallelujah. Glory to the God. Amen.
I am inspired. Praise the Lord!
I like this song because I always follow the Lamb. Those who follow the Lamb live and walk in mingled spirit and have a life of no regrets. Hallelujah!
This hymn is so enjoyable. Lord, make me one of those one hundred and forty four thousand! We sang this hymn in the Bay Area SST. It was such a wonderful harmony. Praise the Lord for the Lamb!
When the Richmond sisters sang this song in our home meeting it is so enjoyable. When I would play this on the piano it warms my heart.
Praise the Lord that we have a spirit; the one who follow the Lamb is the one who lives in the mingled spirit.

O this is what the Lord desires-those who follow the Lamb, living and walking in mingled spirit, led by the Spirit in their daily lives! Hallelujah! O Lord, may we be ones who are led by the Spirit in our daily lives.

I first heard the song on youtube and I was really captured with the word "Follow The Lamb". The Lord is always there for us, we just turn to our Mingled Spirit to Follow the Lamb and sure we will not lost our way. Praise the Lord!!!

This is the best graduation song that I have heard thus far. It is beautifully composed and really culminates the feeling that was presented by the Spring 2011 graduating class. I was glad that I had an opportunity to witness it firsthand :) May we all be those that follow the Lamb wherever He may go!
We sang during this last culminating meeting. :)
We sang during this last culminating meeting. :)
Praise the Lord. We may all follow the Lamb wherever He goes.
May we be those who happily follow the Lamb wherever He goes. By His grace, living and walking in our mingled spirit. Lord Jesus, have mercy!
Praise the Lord! Heard this wonderful hymn when I attended my sister's graduation. Follow the Lamb whereever He may go.
This song is incredible. I will never forget when I heard this for the first time from the fourth termers. May we all follow the Lamb wherever He goes!
Very good song. It sounds really good with 3 piano players playing the different parts at the same time. :)
